title: Ukraine celebrates Crimea bridge blast
description: Russia's only bridge to the annexed territory has partly re-opened following the explosion. Also: People take to the streets of Iran in defiance of a security crackdown, as anti-government protests enter their fourth week, and the story of a 1,200 kg pumpkin that met a sticky end.
itunes:subtitle: Russia's only bridge to the annexed territory has partly re-opened since the explosion
itunes:summary: Russia's only bridge to the annexed territory has partly re-opened following the explosion. Also: People take to the streets of Iran in defiance of a security crackdown, as anti-government protests enter their fourth week, and the story of a 1,200 kg pumpkin that met a sticky end.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
